text: 19.9 Apo 9.2, 2 Ko 6.14-18, 2 Pi 2.2 Pen kɨli ogɨnap, takaw tep ak ma yɨbɨl dɨlak. Kelɨgɨlak. Binɨb yelak nab ak agɨlak, Bɨawl kanɨb tep ne ameb apal takaw anɨb ak, takaw tek ma lup agɨlak. Anɨb agelak, Pol kɨlop kelɨgɨl, binɨb Jisas yɨl yelak okok kɨlop dad Tilanus sikul kal awl ak amɨl, mɨnek mɨnek kɨlop takaw agñɨ yolɨgup.
